name: That's How Sumireko's Roach Stomping Mafia Works!
name_original: That's How Sumireko's Roach Stomping Mafia Works!
description:
Help Sumireko from the Touhou series to stomp on all the roaches without touching the ground! It's life or death once you start stomping on the bugs!

Z to jump!

X to air dash!

Arrow keys to move.

This is a submission for Touhou Fan Game Jam 3.

Game is created by:

ChairGTables - programming

Sylvysprit - music composition

DannyRG - pixel art

Tristama - non-pixel art
